allowTakeOver.label: Allow Takeover
allowTakeOver.description: If enabled, the resource can be taken over by other users without the current user having to release the resource.

requireSessionDurationEstimation.label: Require Duration Estimation
requireSessionDurationEstimation.description: If enabled, users must provide an estimated session duration when starting a session.

toast.title: Error Creating Resource
toast.description: Could not create the resource. Please try again.

toast.title: Error Updating Resource
toast.description: Could not update the resource. Please try again.
